data.what_is: Lead Management Software, Online Lead Tracking, Email Marketing & SFA CRM.
data.product_description: Lead Management Software, Online Lead Tracking, Email Marketing & SFA CRM.

features.name: Customization
features.content: Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Document & Content Mgmt.
features.content: Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Customization
features.content: System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Contact & Account Management
features.content: Based on 10 LeadMaster reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Store and retrieve information associated to customer contacts and accounts.  Track company-wide communication and information about contacts and accounts.

features.name: Opportunity & Pipeline Mgmt.
features.content: Manage sales opportunities through their lifecycle from lead to order. Track stages, values, and probabilities of close.  Manage sales pipelines by individual sales rep, team, region, and company-wide.

features.name: Task / Activity Management
features.content: Manage and track tasks and activities.  Assign due dates and integrate to calendars to manage daily schedules and priorities.

features.name: Territory & Quota Management
features.content: Assign and manage sales quotas and territories.  Track progress against quotas.  Change as needed.

features.name: Desktop Integration
features.content: Allows users to sync their Email, Calendar and Contact tools with their CRM system.  Includes Microsoft Outlook and Google integration.

features.name: Product & Price List Management
features.content: Enter product/part numbers and manage the prices associated with them.  Typically functionality allows users to add products and prices to opportunities and quotes if these modules are provided within the same system.

features.name: Quote & Order Management
features.content: Allows users to create a quote to be provided to a customer that contain at least products, prices and associated discounts.  Order management allows users to process orders that contain products, prices and associated discounts.

features.name: Customer Contract Management
features.content: Management of contracts made with customers.  Contract management includes negotiating the terms and conditions in contracts and ensuring compliance with the terms and conditions, as well as documenting and agreeing on any changes or amendments that may arise during its implementation or execution.

features.name: Email Marketing
features.content: Allows users to send email to contacts in bulk.  Common features include: Built in Email templates, social media integration, Subscriber list management, sign up forms, success rate reports, AB testing and auto-responders.

features.name: Campaign Management
features.content: Optimizes the process for organizations to develop and deploy multiple-channel marketing campaigns to target groups or individuals and track the effect of those campaigns, by customer segment, over time.

features.name: Lead Management
features.content: Allows users to manage and track leads though a process.  The lead process typically involves steps such as:  1. Lead Generation, 2. Customer Inquiry, Inquiry Capture, Lead Filtering, Lead Grading, Lead Distribution and Lead Qualification.

features.name: Marketing ROI Analytics
features.content: Enables analysis of effectiveness of an organizations various marketing activities

features.name: Case ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Tracks issues/help requests reported by customers through the resolution process.

features.name: Customer Support Portal
features.content: Provides a convenient way for customers to get answers to inquiries, post service issues, place orders, view order histories, and gain access to other information contained in the knowledge base.

features.name: Knowledge Base
features.content: Information repository that provides a means for information to be collected, organized, shared, searched and utilized.  Allows customers to get answers to common questions.

features.name: Call Center Features
features.content: Allows customer support professionals access to all information required to support the customer including customer information, case history and related customer social activity.  Common features include:  call recording, analytics, workforce management, call script management, and compliance management.

features.name: Support Analytics
features.content: Enables analysis of customer support activities to optimize customer support professionals, processes and tools.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Social Collaboration Features
features.content: Enables multiple users to interact by sharing information to achieve a common goal.  Social collaboration focus's on the identification of groups and collaboration spaces in which messages are explicitly directed at the group and the group activity feed is seen the same way by everyone

features.name: Social Network Integration
features.content: Use public social networks to listen and engage with customers.  Allows users to filter what's important and respond quickly.  Often this functionality allows questions and requests from customers on social networks to case management.

features.name: Mobile User Support
features.content: Allows software to be easily used on multiple mobile devices include phone and tablet devices.

features.name: Reporting
features.content: Enables reporting of all data contained within the system.  Typically contains standard reports as well as the ability to create ad-hoc reports.

features.name: Dashboards
features.content: An easy to read, often single page, real-time user interface, showing a graphical presentation of the current status and historical trends of an organization's Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to enable instantaneous and informed decisions to be made at a glance

features.name: Forecasting
features.content: Enables projection of sales revenue, based on historical sales data, analysis of market surveys and trends, and salespersons' estimates.

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about LeadMaster?
The tool for email marketing is fantastic! I was able to monitor which emails were read thanks to it. The automatic reporting function is quite effective. It is also quite simple to use thanks to its well organized style and one button updates.

What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
Sometimes the platform feels outdated and sluggish, which can be quite frustrating. It also has a steep learning curve, making it difficult for beginners to use. Its on the pricier side when compared to other available options.

What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
My teams progress was easily monitored with the help of LeadMasters reporting feature and the capabilities for email marketing and sales force automation also helped us save money. It provided a central area for managing all of my leads and acted as a nice reminder for leads that I had forgotten about. LeadMaster provides a complete all in one solution for lead management in addition to other things.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about LeadMaster?
review_question_answers.answer: The tool for email marketing is fantastic! I was able to monitor which emails were read thanks to it. The automatic reporting function is quite effective. It is also quite simple to use thanks to its well organized style and one button updates.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
review_question_answers.answer: Sometimes the platform feels outdated and sluggish, which can be quite frustrating. It also has a steep learning curve, making it difficult for beginners to use. Its on the pricier side when compared to other available options.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: My teams progress was easily monitored with the help of LeadMasters reporting feature and the capabilities for email marketing and sales force automation also helped us save money. It provided a central area for managing all of my leads and acted as a nice reminder for leads that I had forgotten about. LeadMaster provides a complete all in one solution for lead management in addition to other things.

initial_reviews.review_title: Intuitive platform but can be limited
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about LeadMaster?
There's an intuitive user experience and a simple platform.

What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
It's a simple platform but it can be limited. When I used it, it looked outdated but it gets the job done.

What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
Updating the platform to have a better user experience, provide more options

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about LeadMaster?
review_question_answers.answer: There's an intuitive user experience and a simple platform.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
review_question_answers.answer: It's a simple platform but it can be limited. When I used it, it looked outdated but it gets the job done.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Updating the platform to have a better user experience, provide more options

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about LeadMaster?
This customer relationship management tool is very helpful with some amazing features in it. It helped us managing leads and online leads tracking. The best tool is its email marketing. It also tells about the emails that have been read. It facilitated us with importing data by customer. The reporting feature is also very effective and automated. This is a cost saving solution with excellent customer services.

What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
We often find it slow. The speed slows down sometimes. People find it hard to use and even we also required a huge learning before using it. The application is good but will be confusing for beginners. It is better than its alternatives but if we compare its pricing it is still expensive solution to use.

What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are looking for CRM in our organization and this is a good start for my team as we are now able to read recent updated notes and track everything on other hand. We can easily interact to our customer during updating. We can easily track the previous contacted leads. This is very helpful for our organization.

The reporting feature is also very effective and automated. This is a cost saving solution with excellent customer services.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about LeadMaster?
Love the organization and the easy click updates

What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
That the site is spelling and space sensitive. Someone could accidentally spell a name wrong and I could possible never find it. It does not generate names that it was close to or almost like. If you spell something wrong or do not put the correct spaces, it says no records found.

Recommendations to others considering LeadMaster:
The whole concept of leadmaster is great! Just have to understand and thoroughly know how it works and how to update it properly so it can work efficiently. If employees are all updating it differently, it will not work correctly. Just make sure you train your employees in the area and implement the importance of it.

What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
It helps with leads that we have and what area we need to focus on. The bad thing is that not all employees understand how leadmaster works and how to use it. It is a different system to understand if an employee is older in age.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about LeadMaster?
I love that all my leads are in one place. I also appreciate that it sends me reminders to reach out to leads I might have forgotten about.

What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
How difficult it is to look at a certain area. I can't search based on Birthday or lead status at a certain facility. It is also very time consuming to put leads into LeadMaster. It also still sends you reminders on leads that you have gotten enrolled and they are no longer leads.

What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
Benefits is that it reminds you of leads that you might have forgotten about, which helps a lot. It helps keep everyone accountable as well and you can see how your fellow workers are doing as well.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about LeadMaster?
review_question_answers.answer: I love that all my leads are in one place. I also appreciate that it sends me reminders to reach out to leads I might have forgotten about.

review_question_answers.answer: How difficult it is to look at a certain area. I can't search based on Birthday or lead status at a certain facility. It is also very time consuming to put leads into LeadMaster. It also still sends you reminders on leads that you have gotten enrolled and they are no longer leads.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Benefits is that it reminds you of leads that you might have forgotten about, which helps a lot. It helps keep everyone accountable as well and you can see how your fellow workers are doing as well.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about LeadMaster?
I like that it is very simple to use, but it is almost too basic for a CRM.

What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
Overall, it feels antiquated. More modern CRMs seem to fit the needs of our business better (pulling reports, ease of use, etc.)

Recommendations to others considering LeadMaster:
If you are a very small, basic business, than this product might be okay for you. Otherwise, look for a more robust option.

What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
It is great for holding/keeping track of our older data, otherwise, it does not do much for us anymore.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about LeadMaster?
review_question_answers.answer: I like that it is very simple to use, but it is almost too basic for a CRM.

initial_reviews.review_title: We at "Strategic Operations" use LeadMasterCRM, our market focus is government services and have fou
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about LeadMaster?
I like the customer service and assistance, our business model requires tracking numerous product lines and line items. The LeadMasterCRM provides data arrangement in layers that is logical and simple to use.

I am a huge fan of importing data for updates, and new data entry, the LeadMasterCRM accommodates broad data importing by customer, opportunity and by job codes.

I also like the report functions such as; report subscriptions.  All I have to worry about is the data entry the reports are automated.

The E-mail blast functionality is also an excellent feature, telling me how many e-mails were read etc.

What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
Can be a bit slow at times but the Customer service team will correct this if you send a request.

Recommendations to others considering LeadMaster:
Cost savings & excellent customer service is the value you can expect from the LeadMasterCRM

What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
The LeadMasterCRM provides a single point of Collaboration for our business teams and back office support all customer centric.

We have the ability to speak to our customers in a big way, while at the same time we have the ability to read recent update notes, track everything else from quotes to shipping documents.

I like the customer service and assistance, our business model requires tracking numerous product lines and line items. The LeadMasterCRM provides data arrangement in layers that is logical and simple to use.

I am a huge fan of importing data for updates, and new data entry, the LeadMasterCRM accommodates broad data importing by customer, opportunity and by job codes.

I also like the report functions such as; report subscriptions.  All I have to worry about is the data entry the reports are automated.

The E-mail blast functionality is also an excellent feature, telling me how many e-mails were read etc.

We have the ability to speak to our customers in a big way, while at the same time we have the ability to read recent update notes, track everything else from quotes to shipping documents.

initial_reviews.review_title: Leadmaster is a powerful and flexible CRM System
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about LeadMaster?
We leverage leadmaster CRM for a wide spectrum of clients.  We have found that Leadmaster is very powerful and able to address requirements for many different clients at reasonable prices.  The system is also very straight forward to develop and maintain new client applications.

What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
We have found that Leadmaster meets all our needs.

Recommendations to others considering LeadMaster:
It is best to fully think through requirements before building the application.   This will streamline development and implementation

What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
Leadmaster has solved requirements from straight forward CRM to Outbound marketing applications, to real time lead integration applications.  Leadmaster is powerful without the complexity and expense of aSalesforce.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about LeadMaster?
review_question_answers.answer: We leverage leadmaster CRM for a wide spectrum of clients.  We have found that Leadmaster is very powerful and able to address requirements for many different clients at reasonable prices.  The system is also very straight forward to develop and maintain new client applications.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
review_question_answers.answer: We have found that Leadmaster meets all our needs.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering LeadMaster:
review_question_answers.answer: It is best to fully think through requirements before building the application.   This will streamline development and implementation

review_question_answers.question: What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Leadmaster has solved requirements from straight forward CRM to Outbound marketing applications, to real time lead integration applications.  Leadmaster is powerful without the complexity and expense of aSalesforce.

it helps me stay organized! i appreciate that it keeps contacts in one place.

What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
i wish i could integrate it with outlook.

What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
i am not aware of any business problems.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about LeadMaster?
Great user friendly program that is great for storing and working with leads especially in a telemarketing capacity. Stores a lot of info and it's easy to send leads from within the program.

What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
Can sometimes be quirky and can be a little difficult to run various reports that are needed to evaluate efficiency of callers.

What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
Use this for telemarketing campaigns. Can search within program to see if we have contacted leads before. The ability to make detailed notes is very helpful to our various call campaigns.

initial_reviews.review_title: LeadMaster is a great multi-purpose web-based solution
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about LeadMaster?
LeadMaster offers a comprehensive CRM at a great price. It allows our company to manage customers and leads efficiently. The sales and customer service support is fantastic as well.
There's a lot of help on the backend in learning the product with the videos and instructions. The library is an excellent tool.

What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
Currently, the email campaign editor does not have a working spell check function.
Recommendations. But I really have no prevailing concerns.

What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
The monthly subscription covers installation, upgrades, maintenance, and software licensing. LeadMaster also offers personal guidance from their LeadMaster Partners. Easy-to-use, easy-to-learn, with a hefty number of sales lead management offerings.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about LeadMaster?
review_question_answers.answer:
LeadMaster offers a comprehensive CRM at a great price. It allows our company to manage customers and leads efficiently. The sales and customer service support is fantastic as well.
There's a lot of help on the backend in learning the product with the videos and instructions. The library is an excellent tool.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
review_question_answers.answer:
Currently, the email campaign editor does not have a working spell check function.
Recommendations. But I really have no prevailing concerns.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: The monthly subscription covers installation, upgrades, maintenance, and software licensing. LeadMaster also offers personal guidance from their LeadMaster Partners. Easy-to-use, easy-to-learn, with a hefty number of sales lead management offerings.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about LeadMaster?
The tool for email marketing is fantastic! I was able to monitor which emails were read thanks to it. The automatic reporting function is quite effective. It is also quite simple to use thanks to its well organized style and one button updates.

What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
Sometimes the platform feels outdated and sluggish, which can be quite frustrating. It also has a steep learning curve, making it difficult for beginners to use. Its on the pricier side when compared to other available options.

What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
My teams progress was easily monitored with the help of LeadMasters reporting feature and the capabilities for email marketing and sales force automation also helped us save money. It provided a central area for managing all of my leads and acted as a nice reminder for leads that I had forgotten about. LeadMaster provides a complete all in one solution for lead management in addition to other things.

review_question_answers.answer: Sometimes the platform feels outdated and sluggish, which can be quite frustrating. It also has a steep learning curve, making it difficult for beginners to use. Its on the pricier side when compared to other available options.

LeadMaster provides a complete all in one solution for lead management in addition to other things.

There's an intuitive user experience and a simple platform.

What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
It's a simple platform but it can be limited. When I used it, it looked outdated but it gets the job done.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about LeadMaster?
This customer relationship management tool is very helpful with some amazing features in it. It helped us managing leads and online leads tracking. The best tool is its email marketing. It also tells about the emails that have been read. It facilitated us with importing data by customer. The reporting feature is also very effective and automated. This is a cost saving solution with excellent customer services.

What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
We often find it slow. The speed slows down sometimes. People find it hard to use and even we also required a huge learning before using it. The application is good but will be confusing for beginners. It is better than its alternatives but if we compare its pricing it is still expensive solution to use.

What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are looking for CRM in our organization and this is a good start for my team as we are now able to read recent updated notes and track everything on other hand. We can easily interact to our customer during updating. We can easily track the previous contacted leads. This is very helpful for our organization.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about LeadMaster?
review_question_answers.answer: This customer relationship management tool is very helpful with some amazing features in it. It helped us managing leads and online leads tracking. The best tool is its email marketing. It also tells about the emails that have been read. It facilitated us with importing data by customer. The reporting feature is also very effective and automated. This is a cost saving solution with excellent customer services.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about LeadMaster?
Love the organization and the easy click updates

What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
That the site is spelling and space sensitive. Someone could accidentally spell a name wrong and I could possible never find it. It does not generate names that it was close to or almost like. If you spell something wrong or do not put the correct spaces, it says no records found.

Recommendations to others considering LeadMaster:
The whole concept of leadmaster is great! Just have to understand and thoroughly know how it works and how to update it properly so it can work efficiently. If employees are all updating it differently, it will not work correctly. Just make sure you train your employees in the area and implement the importance of it.

What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
It helps with leads that we have and what area we need to focus on. The bad thing is that not all employees understand how leadmaster works and how to use it. It is a different system to understand if an employee is older in age.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about LeadMaster?
I love that all my leads are in one place. I also appreciate that it sends me reminders to reach out to leads I might have forgotten about.

What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
How difficult it is to look at a certain area. I can't search based on Birthday or lead status at a certain facility. It is also very time consuming to put leads into LeadMaster. It also still sends you reminders on leads that you have gotten enrolled and they are no longer leads.

What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
Benefits is that it reminds you of leads that you might have forgotten about, which helps a lot. It helps keep everyone accountable as well and you can see how your fellow workers are doing as well.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about LeadMaster?
review_question_answers.answer: I love that all my leads are in one place. I also appreciate that it sends me reminders to reach out to leads I might have forgotten about.

review_question_answers.answer: How difficult it is to look at a certain area. I can't search based on Birthday or lead status at a certain facility. It is also very time consuming to put leads into LeadMaster. It also still sends you reminders on leads that you have gotten enrolled and they are no longer leads.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Benefits is that it reminds you of leads that you might have forgotten about, which helps a lot. It helps keep everyone accountable as well and you can see how your fellow workers are doing as well.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about LeadMaster?
I like that it is very simple to use, but it is almost too basic for a CRM.

What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
Overall, it feels antiquated. More modern CRMs seem to fit the needs of our business better (pulling reports, ease of use, etc.)

Recommendations to others considering LeadMaster:
If you are a very small, basic business, than this product might be okay for you. Otherwise, look for a more robust option.

What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
It is great for holding/keeping track of our older data, otherwise, it does not do much for us anymore.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about LeadMaster?
review_question_answers.answer: I like that it is very simple to use, but it is almost too basic for a CRM.

all_reviews.review_title: We at "Strategic Operations" use LeadMasterCRM, our market focus is government services and have fou
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about LeadMaster?
I like the customer service and assistance, our business model requires tracking numerous product lines and line items. The LeadMasterCRM provides data arrangement in layers that is logical and simple to use.

I am a huge fan of importing data for updates, and new data entry, the LeadMasterCRM accommodates broad data importing by customer, opportunity and by job codes.

I also like the report functions such as; report subscriptions.  All I have to worry about is the data entry the reports are automated.

The E-mail blast functionality is also an excellent feature, telling me how many e-mails were read etc.

What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
Can be a bit slow at times but the Customer service team will correct this if you send a request.

Recommendations to others considering LeadMaster:
Cost savings & excellent customer service is the value you can expect from the LeadMasterCRM

What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
The LeadMasterCRM provides a single point of Collaboration for our business teams and back office support all customer centric.

We have the ability to speak to our customers in a big way, while at the same time we have the ability to read recent update notes, track everything else from quotes to shipping documents.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about LeadMaster?
review_question_answers.answer:
I like the customer service and assistance, our business model requires tracking numerous product lines and line items. The LeadMasterCRM provides data arrangement in layers that is logical and simple to use.

I am a huge fan of importing data for updates, and new data entry, the LeadMasterCRM accommodates broad data importing by customer, opportunity and by job codes.

I also like the report functions such as; report subscriptions.  All I have to worry about is the data entry the reports are automated.

The E-mail blast functionality is also an excellent feature, telling me how many e-mails were read etc.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
review_question_answers.answer: Can be a bit slow at times but the Customer service team will correct this if you send a request.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering LeadMaster:
review_question_answers.answer: Cost savings & excellent customer service is the value you can expect from the LeadMasterCRM

review_question_answers.question: What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
The LeadMasterCRM provides a single point of Collaboration for our business teams and back office support all customer centric.

We have the ability to speak to our customers in a big way, while at the same time we have the ability to read recent update notes, track everything else from quotes to shipping documents.

all_reviews.review_title: Leadmaster is a powerful and flexible CRM System
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about LeadMaster?
We leverage leadmaster CRM for a wide spectrum of clients.  We have found that Leadmaster is very powerful and able to address requirements for many different clients at reasonable prices.  The system is also very straight forward to develop and maintain new client applications.

What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
We have found that Leadmaster meets all our needs.

Recommendations to others considering LeadMaster:
It is best to fully think through requirements before building the application.   This will streamline development and implementation

What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
Leadmaster has solved requirements from straight forward CRM to Outbound marketing applications, to real time lead integration applications.  Leadmaster is powerful without the complexity and expense of aSalesforce.

What do you like best about LeadMaster?
LeadMaster offers a comprehensive CRM at a great price. It allows our company to manage customers and leads efficiently. The sales and customer service support is fantastic as well.
There's a lot of help on the backend in learning the product with the videos and instructions. The library is an excellent tool.

What do you dislike about LeadMaster?
Currently, the email campaign editor does not have a working spell check function.
Recommendations. But I really have no prevailing concerns.

What problems is LeadMaster solving and how is that benefiting you?
The monthly subscription covers installation, upgrades, maintenance, and software licensing. LeadMaster also offers personal guidance from their LeadMaster Partners. Easy-to-use, easy-to-learn, with a hefty number of sales lead management offerings.
